Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.Model

Class CheckManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Model.CheckManager
public class CheckManager extends Object
Class used to make checks based on the current player and the current state.

    • checkRemoveLegit

      public void checkRemoveLegit(ArrayList<Point> points, Player player, Board board) throws MoveNotPossible, IllegalArgumentException
      Method to check if the player can remove the selected tiles from the board.
      Parameters:
      points - The array of points you want to remove.
      player - The player who wants to remove the tiles.
      board - The board of the game.
      Throws:
      MoveNotPossible - if the game is not in the right state.
      NotCurrentPlayer - if the player is not the current player.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the array points is null.
      TilesNotAdjacent - if the tiles are not adjacent.
      OutOfDomain - if at least one of the points is outside the board.
      TilesCannotBeSelected - if at least one of the selected tiles is either Empty or Not Allowed.
      TooManySelected - if the points array is too long.

    • checkAddLegit

      public void checkAddLegit(Player player, int col, int size) throws MoveNotPossible
      Method to check if the player can add tiles to his bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      player - The player trying to add tiles to his bookshelf.
      col - The column number where to add the tiles.
      size - The number of tiles you want to add.
      Throws:
      OutOfDomain - if requested column does not exists.
      ColumnIsFull - if the requested column is full.
      MoveNotPossible - if game is not in the right state.
      NotCurrentPlayer - if the player requesting the move is not the current player.

    • swapCheck

      public void swapCheck(ArrayList<Integer> ints, Player player) throws MoveNotPossible, IllegalArgumentException
      Method to check if the player can swap the selectedTiles array.
      Parameters:
      ints - Swap array.
      player - Player.
      Throws:
      MoveNotPossible - The game is not in the right state.
      NotCurrentPlayer - The player is not the current player.
      IllegalArgumentException - The ints array is not of appropriate content.
      TooManySelected - if the array is not of appropriate size.
